message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your company.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase it, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm afraid I can't accept $9000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10500. This is a compromise that still reflects the value of the product, while also acknowledging your budget concerns.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $9800, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you consider this price?
